name: Ball Bounce - mobile version
description:
This is the mobile version of Ball Bounce game.

HOW TO PLAY:

Score 1 point for each ball bounce.

Don't let the ball touch the rotating blades.

CONTROLS:

Touch on the left side of the screen to move the ball left.
Touch on the right side of the screen to move the ball right.

CREDITS:

This game was created with Easy Game Maker.
